answers.answer: I developed it with my first at 28wks but at 35wks my bp went up to 170/140 and protein rose significantly so I had a csection 2hrs after seeing my dr. This time I developed it at 15wks but they've managed my symotoms pretty well and protein hasn't increased so they scheduled me for a csection right on 36wks (2 days to go!!) because they don't want it to go like last time. So I think it depends on how high your bp is, how much protein your leaking as this is an indication of your liver and kidneys struggling, and whether baby would be better off finishing developing outside or inside as to when they'll do it. Wishing you and bub lots of luck!
Sweetheart keep a eye on your BP If you can't wait until tomorrow go to hospital just to be safe
Read my labor story because it sounds like what u are going thru

I've been in the hospital for a week now on bed rest. I have preeclampsia and the dr has not said if he is gonna Induce me yet! Tomorrow I'll be 37 weeks but he did say I don't get to go home or get outta bed till after I have my daughter!

Ladies thanks for sharing your stories, I hope all is well with you guys. I would hate bed rest & sorry you've had to go through that.@thaiworld Congrats, glad you two are okay. I was just told to get plenty rest (informed my dr of how busy I've been trying to cleab the whole house to prepare for baby).  Starting the urine collection in about 4-5hrs & hoping all is well with the results. (Even though I would LOVE being induced & having my baby girl in Thanksgiving.lol! ☺

I've had high BP since about 25weeks. It goes up and down and never seemed to stay stable. I also developed spots in my vision, headaches, aches in ribs and bad swelling in my hands and feet. They said I was on the verge of developing preeclampsia. The only thing I was missing was protein in the urine. Today they found a trace of that, which obviously scared the life out of me but they said not to worry unless I start to produce more. I also had an ultrasound that confirmed my placenta is calcified.. I've been booked for inducement next Tuesday. I'm back every second day for CTG's, Blood tests, urine tests and bp checks to make sure I don't need to go in earlier. Next Wednesday I will be 38weeks. That's what happened with me :) I wish you the very best and hope everything goes smoothly for you x
Stay as calm as possible u. Find something that help to comfort you. For me it was my mom. She could not leave me without me crying

@kaedii sorry to hear, that sounds like a lot!@thaiworld I'm fine. I just wanted to know if I could be induced or not & how soon. My son was born on Mother's Day sk I would like for her to be born on a holiday too. Besides that, I haven't even packed my bag or made arrangements for my son. But from yall stories, sounds like I should get moving just in case.

question: 38+5 yesterday & had my checkup - bp was 16?/9?.... ordered to do the 24 hr uterine collection starting  (when I wake up)today & will find out results on Thanksgiving.  I had high bp before the pregnancy so I was considered high risk, but haven't had any problems. around 5 months, had a spike & did the 24 hr urine collection before.....Had anyone else experiencing this during their last week/2 weeks? What was your outcome? Did you need to be induced? If induced, how soon did they schedule induction?
title: Pre-eclampsia????
